Class FiberSocketChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.fibers.io.FiberSocketChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ByteChannel, Channel, GatheringByteChannel, NetworkChannel, ReadableByteChannel, ScatteringByteChannel, WritableByteChannel

    public class FiberSocketChannel
extends Object
implements ByteChannel, ScatteringByteChannel, GatheringByteChannel, NetworkChannel
